summary: HDT and Bodyslide conversion for Selene armor (by Neo)
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple conversion for the Selene armor by Neo.

It contains Bodyslide files for HDT and non HDT.

1. Get your game HDT and Bodyslide ready.
2. Download and install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48077/?]Selene armor by Neo[/url]. (Main file and fixed esp)
3. Copy my files in your Bodyslide folder.
4. Run Bodyslide.
5. Under Outfit/Body select SeleneArms then your Preset and click Build.
6. Under Outfit/Body select SeleneHDT OR SeleneNoBBP then your Preset and click Build. (Make sure that the "zapbody" checkbox is set to true)
7. Enjoy


Thanks to Neovinci for the advise and creating this awesome armor!
author: mbw1
